Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a drawing of a healthy plant that has water and light.
The student can illustrate a plant that lacks water to show how it looks different.
The student can illustrate a plant that lacks light to show how it looks different.
The student can depict the importance of water by showing changes in plants when water is removed.
The student can depict the importance of light by showing changes in plants when light is removed.
The student can identify and label the parts of the drawing that show plants needing water and light.
